subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is considering pushing the women’s 3-point line one foot farther out, to 20 feet 9 inches, beginning next season. The 20-foot, 9-inch line is the standard in men’s college basketball.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. is considering pushing the women’s 3-point line one foot farther out, to 20 feet 9 inches, beginning next season. The 20-foot, 9-inch line is the standard in men’s college basketball.
